  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81277</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81277</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the movement of hot and cold water when it is heated in one (top) and two places (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bewegung des heißen und
kalten Wassers, wenn sie in einen (Oberseite) und zwei Plätzen 
(Unterseite) erhitzt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mouvement de l'eau 
chaude et froide quand elle est chauffée dans un (dessus) et deux 
endroits (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o movimento da água 
quente e fria quando é aquecida em um (alto) e dois lugares (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il movimento di acqua 
calda e fredda quando è riscaldata in un (parte superiore) e due 
posti (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μετακίνηση του καυτού 
και κρύου νερού πότε θερμαίνεται σε ισχύ μια (κορυφή) και δύο 
(κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el movimiento de la agua
caliente y fría cuando se calienta en un (tapa) y dos lugares 
(fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kaltes Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißwasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">eau froide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">eau chaude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água fria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água quente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua fredda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua calda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κρύο νερό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέρμανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καυτό ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua fría</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calefacción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua caliente</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
